title: The Old Knight of a Frontier District - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beasts   Calm Protagonist   Cooking   Dragons   Elderly Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Fantasy World   Herbalist   Knights   Limited Lifespan   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Merchants   Mythical Beasts   Nobles   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Quirky Characters   Religions   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sentimental Protagonist   Spirits   Sword Wielder   World Travel
author: ShienBIS   支援BIS
description: In the eastern frontier of the continent there was a house Telsia and a knight who served them for many years. Age had taken its toll on his body, and knowing that the last of his days grew ever nearer, he retired from his service to his lords, surrendered nearly all he owned, and set off on a journey–a solitary journey that he might taste all the curious foods and see all of the interesting sights that this world had to offer. What he did not realize, however, was that this journey was but the beginning of a tale that would be told in the continent for many years to come.>
